channel.title: Effective staking rate
channel.description:
Here is a quick spreadsheet I made regarding the approximate effective stake weight based on the number of BAY being staked on the network. So at 50% of the total supply staking the effective stake rate for your coins is 2% "APR". These numbers are based off the available specs for BAY. If I'm not mistaken I do believe that the minimum 1% stake is based off of the current supply at the time, ie currently 1,009,138,145 so the actual yearly stake amount would be 10,091,381 and growing.
![Staking|563x430](upload://3UZudlWSycwx1okLZ8MWpwQtQGt.JPG)
